1.0.name: wordpress/facebookall
1.0.description:
The Facebook All Plugin is a collection of facebook social plugins for Wordpress. that allows your visitors to comment, login and register with social networks Facebook. Make your blog social!

Its includes:

  • Facebook Login
  • Facebook Fanbox
  • Facebook Facepile
  • Facebook Comments
  • Facebook Recommendations Bar
  • Social Sharing

Features:

  • Choose where to show facebook login.
  • optioally redirect user after login.
  • User friendly admin interface
  • Easy to configure
  • Rich profile data
  • Buddypress compatible
  • All faceook socialplugins in one pack
  • Fully customizable facebook icon
  • Many more...

This plugin is maintained by sourceaddons. for any tech support or any customization please contact sourceaddons or write a email to us on
